abstract: New Delhi Court convicts former Uber driver Shiv Kumar Yadav of raping female passenger, in addition to kidnapping; Yadav faces maximum sentence of life in prison; case has raised widespread concern about potential dangers of ride-sharing services in countries like India, where there have been number of prominent cases of rape.
lead_paragraph: The case elicited widespread concern over the dangers of ride-hailing services in India, where there have been a number of prominent rape cases in recent years.

headline.main: Ex-Driver for Uber Is Convicted of Raping Passenger in New Delhi
headline.print_headline: Ex-Driver for Uber Is Convicted of Raping Passenger in New Delhi

snippet: The case elicited widespread concern over the dangers of ride-hailing services in India, where there have been a number of prominent rape cases in recent years.
